text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Please keep the daily trump rallies going, Coronavirus Task Force my ass. I can’t wait until someone really stands up to this dude that thinks he’s above it all! How could one person lie so much, specially with so much proof of the lies he told before. Pathological 🤥
